description:
Another meowteor falls from the sky. As he approaches it, Bananya realizes that it looks just like the round thing in the sky. He immediately takes it to the elder, who shows him many pictures of the round thing in the sky, much to Bananya`s delight.  But before he realizes it... nyaaa... zzz
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bananya and the Round Thing of Dreams, Nya
Bananya to Akogare no Manmaru Nya
ばなにゃとあこがれのまんまる にゃ
